bug.author: hipwelljo
bug.description:
Using Turi Create 5.0, I seem to be encountering the same issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/361>#361</denchmark-link> that others saw with a previous release. It completes training due to reaching the iteration limit, and then logs . It does not evaluate the model and log the accuracy. <denchmark-code>model = tc.image_classifier.create(train_data, target='label', model='squeezenet_v1.1')
predictions = model.classify(test_data)
metrics = model.evaluate(test_data) print "Accuracy: %s" % metrics['accuracy'] </denchmark-code>
The output is: <denchmark-code>Logistic regression: -------------------------------------------------------- Number of examples : 49264 Number of classes : 5742 Number of feature columns : 1 Number of unpacked features : 1000 Number of coefficients : 5746741 Starting L-BFGS -------------------------------------------------------- +-----------+----------+-----------+--------------+-------------------+---------------------+ | Iteration | Passes | Step size | Elapsed Time | Training Accuracy | Validation Accuracy | +-----------+----------+-----------+--------------+-------------------+---------------------+ | 0 | 1 | NaN | 1410.938340 | 0.000142 | 0.000410 | | 1 | 4 | 0.000101 | 6993.121902 | 0.000284 | 0.000000 | | 2 | 6 | 1.000000 | 11684.099158 | 0.008038 | 0.002048 | | 3 | 7 | 1.000000 | 14630.014436 | 0.056796 | 0.013923 | | 4 | 8 | 1.000000 | 17736.467060 | 0.026713 | 0.005733 | | 5 | 9 | 1.000000 | 20273.712870 | 0.072791 | 0.022113 | | 6 | 10 | 1.000000 | 22618.025692 | 0.112049 | 0.037674 | | 7 | 11 | 1.000000 | 25096.515562 | 0.178528 | 0.066339 | | 8 | 12 | 1.000000 | 27513.523471 | 0.241698 | 0.088043 | | 9 | 13 | 1.000000 | 29956.004078 | 0.290983 | 0.110156 | | 10 | 14 | 1.000000 | 32559.100921 | 0.343476 | 0.139640 | +-----------+----------+-----------+--------------+-------------------+---------------------+ Completed (Iteration limit reached). This model may not be optimal. To improve it, consider increasing `max_iterations`. Killed: 9 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Can you share the data by any chance. We can investigate what's going on.
I can't post it publicly, is there a way I can send it to you directly?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/hipwelljo>@hipwelljo</denchmark-link> Can you confirm its fixed in the latest release.
It appears to be fixed. It has reached iteration 14 after 12 hours. I don't plan to let it finish. ðŸ˜›
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/hipwelljo>@hipwelljo</denchmark-link> - thanks for the update. I'll close this issue but let us know if you have the problem again.
Reopening since this issue only occurred at the end of training, probably when calculating validation set statistics.
We've identified the root cause and we have a plan to fix this. Milestone is set for 5.4. Thanks everyone!
We believe this was fixed with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/pull/1402>#1402</denchmark-link> .

In our internal tests, this has been resolved -- <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/pull/1402>#1402</denchmark-link> indeed seemed to fix the issue. Please reopen if there are more issues after 5.4 is released.
